idea: TECHESSENCE LABS PRIVATE LIMITED Techessence Labs is an Agritech startup that uses technological innovations in agriculture to increase its yield, profitability and efficiency. We provide solutions to agricultural challenges like fragmented land holdings, seed and crop quality, availibility of input, supply chain and storage, weather and climate risks as well as soil nutrition. These solutions are based on Internet of Things (IoT) devices, data analytics and IT solutions. Using technology at our disposal, especially in farms, making an impact at the grassroot level, thus endowing farmers with self-sufficiency. Our endeavor does not end only at the farm level but we plan to provide a sustainable ecosystem that empowers the farmers (our producers), the common man (our consumers) with quality products and the supply chain (the bridge between producers and consumers) with stability.
name: TECHESSENCE LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Omnitek Window Works  specialises is the trade of High Quality Windows, Doors and Retractable screen system. It is based in Mumbai, with the manufacturing of the best quality uPVC products in Hyderabad.

Omnitek window works provides with variety of products extending from uPVC Windows, uPVC Doors, Invisible Grill and Retractable Insect Screen. All the windows and Doors are made of European Style double glaze.

The products we sell are made with the highest quality German uPVC frames and Hardware.

We , here at Omnitek, work and strive hard to provide the customers with high quality products which enhance the security and comfort of your houses as well create a healthy work and motivational environment.
name: Omnitek Window Works

idea: MASTRIQ Tech Pvt. Ltd. is in the business of manufacturing, trading and servicing of Manual & Automatic Tinting & Dispensing Machines, Mixers & Shakers and other accessories & tools for Paint & coatings industry. Apart from that, we are also involved in manufacturing of other machines, trading & servicing for different industries such as food, chemicals, cosmetics, beverages etc. MASTRIQ will cater to both domestic as well as overseas market.
name: MASTRIQ TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: ADVISO CHEM INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED is in the chemicals industries. We have well organized and dedicated team of employees to serve the demand of the industries. We manufacturing materials which is mainly used in industrial paint, Decorative paints, Ink Industries, Plastic and molding Industries, Rubber Industries, Paper Industries, Cosmetics Industries, Powder coating Industries, etc…our vision is to be the most customer-centric company in the field of chemical industry; Want to build a place where people can find us for what they need. one of the main objectives of our company is to grow towards a company where we want to provide more and more products in the field of Chemicals. So that we can provide our services to more and more customers. And thus we want to establish ourselves as a big company once in our field. We proudly serve quality materials and provide the exclusive range of titanium dioxide, Pigments and Dyes, Epoxy resins, Carbon black, calcium carbonate, etc. We have designed a new type of warehouse keeping the safety of our product in mind. Which is divided from the inside into many different parts. Which provides the facility of organized storage of different products. Which provides great ease at the time of unloading or loading of the products, thereby facilitating quick dispatch.
name: ADVISO CHEM INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Capital Softs provides 360 degree surveillance services to customers with smart, cost-effective yet reliable and customized systems that will suit their business needs perfectly. Our wide range of products and services include the following:


• installation of CCTV cameras,

• live monitoring systems,

• perimeter monitoring to deter intruders from entering your property,

• regular health monitoring of your surveillance systems

• on-the-go surveillance system, all at one place.
name: CAPITAL SOFTS SECURE PRIVATE LIMITED
